channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.19 (Build 20260124.2)
item.description:
What's New

perf: Optimize focus detection and debug logging performance

  • Add FocusedElementInfo struct to cache AX attributes, reducing redundant API calls
  • Include window title in focus signature to detect Chrome profile switches immediately
  • Only run logMouseClickInputDetection when debug window is visible
  • Update Passthrough injection method description to clarify it disables Vietnamese input

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
